title: Meeting all seminars, conferences, meetings ...for you
text:
Travel Articles | October 23, 2015 
Located in the heart of Hai Phong city with modern architecture, luxurious interior achieving international standards, which can meet all entertainment and accommodation demands of all local and forei... 
Located in the heart of Hai Phong city with modern architecture, luxurious interior achieving international standards, which can meet all entertainment and accommodation demands of all local and foreign tourists and businessmen. Hoang Hai Hotel with 34 spacious, airy, modernly equipped rooms of international standard. Including 2 VIP rooms, 4 Deluxe rooms, 10 Superior and 18 Standard rooms. All rooms have windows, power locks, Air Conditioning, Refrigeration hot tub, work desks, dressing tables, wardrobe, table and chairs set for tea, international telephone, Hair Dryer, refrigerator, color television, multi-channel cable TV, high speed internet, especially with flowers plugged in the room. Wireless internet service free in all rooms, in the conference room, restaurant and bar. 

Catba, the most beautiful and the largest one in the archipelago of 1969 islands, is a natural world heritage amid the Ha Long Bay and was recognized by UNESCO as a World Biosphere Reserve on April 1, 2005. Lying about 60kim northeast of Hai Phong city, Catba is awarded by nature primeval beauty with mountains, hills, seashore, forest and caves. All of them create wonderful and charming scenery. 
Standing in the tourist center of Catba, the Princes Hotel , thanks to its favourable location, has a magnificent architecture with a leading diversified system of service of the island and always attracts tourists. Source: Free Articles from ArticlesFactory.com ABOUT THE AUTHOR 
Welcome to Cat ba, Youâ€™ll be able to further discover the miracles hidden in this well - known natural heritage.
